title: Poland’s Pfizer vaccine refusal lands in Brussels court, testing EU contract limits [Advocacy Lab]
summary_full: A Brussels court is weighing whether Poland must pay Pfizer €1.4 billion for undelivered COVID vaccines, in a case that could impact future EU crisis procurement deals
summary_public: A Brussels court is weighing whether Poland must pay Pfizer €1.4 billion for undelivered COVID vaccines, in a case that could impact future EU crisis procurement deals
